solution_line_template: From all the guests Samanta got ${amount_per_guest}/guest * {num_guests} guests = $<<{amount_per_guest}*{num_guests}={total_from_guests}>>{total_from_guests}.
Including money Samanta put herself, she had ${total_from_guests} + ${samanta_contribution} = $<<{total_from_guests}+{samanta_contribution}={total_money}>>{total_money}.
The cost of the gift was ${total_money} - ${leftover} = $<<{total_money}-{leftover}={gift_price}>>{gift_price}.
